recepies.name:
Mini
Yogurt
Popsicles
recepies.ingredients:
2 Cups Greek Yogurt
0.5 Cup raw honey
1 Cup mixed berries, washed
recepies.howTo:
Blend yogurt and honey together
in a large bowl. Fold mixed berries
in. Transfer into a container with
a spout so the mixture can be
into popsicle molds.
Fill popsicle molds close the top
and put in popsicle sticks.

recepies.name:
Lemonade with
grapfruit
and Lime
recepies.ingredients:
0.5 cup fresh lime juice
0.5 cup fresh lemon juice
0.75 cup sugar
4 cups cold water
1 lemon, sliced
ice cubes.
recepies.howTo:
In a pitcher combine lime
grapefruit lemon juice and sugar.
strir to disolve the sugar
add remaining ingredients and stir until well blended
makes 12 servings.

recepies.name:
Watermelon Mint
Cheese Bites
recepies.ingredients:
2 cups watermelon (cut into cubes)
0.5 lb fresh mozzarella (in small balls or cubes)
0.5 cup fresh mint
0.25 lb prosciutto (thinly sliced)
0.25 cup olive oil
0.25 cup balsamic vinegar.
recepies.howTo:
Mix equal parts oil and vinegar - about 1/8 cup of each to start
and increase depending on how many you are making. Mix cheese
and vinegar mixture until cheese is lightly coated.
Assemble watermelon, cheese, small folded pieces of prosciutto
and mint leaves on a toothpick, starting with the
watermelon and cheese on the bottom, topped by
the prosciutto and finally the mint leaf. Serve at once.

recepies.name: Moroccan Lentil Salad
recepies.ingredients:
1/2 cup dry lentils
1 1/2 cups water
1/2 (15 ounce) can garbanzo beans, drained
4 green onions, chopped
2 minced hot green chile peppers
1 green bell pepper, chopped
1/2 yellow bell pepper, chopped
1 red bell pepper, chopped
1 lime, juiced
2 tablespoons olive oil
recepies.howTo:
Place lentils and water in a pot. Bring water to boil
, reduce to simmer. Cook for 30 minutes or until tender.
In a medium size mixing bowl combine lentils, chickpeas, tomatoes,
green onions, green chilies, bell peppers, lime juice,
olive oil, cilantro, and salt to taste. Toss well.
Chill for 20 minutes. Serve chilled.

recepies.name: Chicken Caesar
recepies.ingredients:
1 free-range egg
2 tbsp extra-virgin olive oil
1 tsp garlic oil
3 tbsp grated parmesan cheese
juice ½ lemon
½ tsp sea salt flakes
1 Romaine or Cos lettuce
150g/5¼oz cold leftover chicken
recepies.howTo:
Crack the egg into a bowl and whisk well
while you add the oils, parmesan and lemon juice.
If you’re not going to add an anchovy
or two, whisk in the salt.
Break the crisp lettuce into bite-sized pieces
and put into a salad bowl. Drop in the shredded
cold chicken and mix to combine. Season
with black pepper, to taste.
Toast the tortilla chips for a couple of minutes
in an oil-less pan over a medium heat.
